reg_pit.title: Criminal and Traffic Search Fee Rule

change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 143/2010, effective August 31, 2010.

reg.title: Criminal and Traffic Search Fee Rule

section.sectiontext: In addition to any other fees payable in respect of proceedings in the Provincial Court, there must be paid to the government, for an Item in the table as it applies to criminal proceedings and traffic proceedings in the Provincial Court, the fee shown in the table as being applicable to that Item.

tablecol.strong:
Fees Applicable to Criminal Proceedings and Traffic Proceedings
in the Provincial Court

tablerow.tablecol: For accessing from outside the registry, including, without limitation, viewing, printing or downloading, any record that is found by or created in response to an electronic search or request, including, without limitation, an index of cases produced in response to a search query

content.provisionsnote: [Provisions of the Court Rules Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 80, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: section 1]
